title: Strengthening Teaching Methodology Practical Competencies: Machine Learning Techniques for Developing and Validating Nutritional Frailty Phenotypes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical knowledge and understanding of data analysis
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Identify key predictive variables (e.g., gait speed, lower limb function, upper body strength) explaining the relationship between nutritional status and frailty.
Explain the procedure for developing a nutritional frailty phenotype using machine learning models (Random Forest, XGBoost).
Analyze the association between nutritional frailty phenotypes and adverse health outcomes (mortality, disability) by applying statistical methods (LASSO, Poisson regression).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
